
---
title: "DdosCooInstance"
block_external_search_index: true
---



<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

BGP-Line Anti-DDoS instance resource. "Ddoscoo" is the short term of this product. See [What is Anti-DDoS Pro](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/69319.htm).

> **NOTE:** The product region only support cn-hangzhou.

> **NOTE:** The endpoint of bssopenapi used only support "business.aliyuncs.com" at present.

> **NOTE:** Available in 1.37.0+ .

{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage
{{% example %}}

Basic Usage

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as alicloud from "@pulumi/alicloud";

const newInstance = new alicloud.dns.DdosCooInstance("newInstance", {
    bandwidth: "30",
    baseBandwidth: "30",
    domainCount: "50",
    period: 1,
    portCount: "50",
    serviceBandwidth: "100",
});
```
{{% /example %}}
{{% /examples %}}

## DdosCooInstance Resource Properties

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) in the Programming Model docs.

### Inputs

The DdosCooInstance resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) properties:




{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Bandwidth</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Elastic defend bandwidth of the instance. This value must be larger than the base defend bandwidth. Valid values: 30, 60, 100, 300, 400, 500, 600. The unit is Gbps. Only support upgrade.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Base<wbr>Bandwidth</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Base defend bandwidth of the instance. Valid values: 30, 60, 100, 300, 400, 500, 600. The unit is Gbps. Only support upgrade.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Domain<wbr>Count</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Domain retransmission rule count of the instance. At least 50. Increase 5 per step, such as 55, 60, 65. Only support upgrade.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Port<wbr>Count</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Port retransmission rule count of the instance. At least 50. Increase 5 per step, such as 55, 60, 65. Only support upgrade.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Service<wbr>Bandwidth</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Business bandwidth of the instance. At leaset 100. Increased 100 per step, such as 100, 200, 300. The unit is Mbps. Only support upgrade.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Name of the instance. This name can have a string of 1 to 63 characters.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Period</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The duration that you will buy Ddoscoo instance (in month). Valid values: [1~9], 12, 24, 36. Default to 1. At present, the provider does not support modify "period".
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

{{% choosable language csharp %}}

<dl class="resources-properties">

        <span>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>

        <span>state</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>

{{% /choosable %}}

The following state arguments are supported:



{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Bandwidth</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Elastic defend bandwidth of the instance. This value must be larger than the base defend bandwidth. Valid values: 30, 60, 100, 300, 400, 500, 600. The unit is Gbps. Only support upgrade.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Base<wbr>Bandwidth</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Base defend bandwidth of the instance. Valid values: 30, 60, 100, 300, 400, 500, 600. The unit is Gbps. Only support upgrade.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Domain<wbr>Count</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Domain retransmission rule count of the instance. At least 50. Increase 5 per step, such as 55, 60, 65. Only support upgrade.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Name of the instance. This name can have a string of 1 to 63 characters.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Period</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The duration that you will buy Ddoscoo instance (in month). Valid values: [1~9], 12, 24, 36. Default to 1. At present, the provider does not support modify "period".
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Port<wbr>Count</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Port retransmission rule count of the instance. At least 50. Increase 5 per step, such as 55, 60, 65. Only support upgrade.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Service<wbr>Bandwidth</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Business bandwidth of the instance. At leaset 100. Increased 100 per step, such as 100, 200, 300. The unit is Mbps. Only support upgrade.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}
